title: Software Developer
body: Design and develop applications based on clients' need. Focused on frontend implementation with React or Angular. Also work on iOS applications with React Native and Swift.

title: UX Developer
body: Work with dev team and design team. Fast prototye design ideas and deliver to user testings. Implement FrontEnd new features.
language: Language used: JavaScript, TypeScript ; Library: React, Redux

title: Software Engineer
body: Conduct user research and case study to enhance performance of autoframing algorithm.
language: Language used: C++ ; Framework: OpenCV, YoloV3
